name: The Terri Barbara Lashner Memorial Charitable Trust. Sylvia LASHNER, Appellant, v. Allan N. LASHNER

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: The Terri Barbara Lashner Memorial Charitable Trust. Sylvia LASHNER, Appellant, v. Allan N. LASHNER.

opinions.text:
DECREE
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gary A. Lashner, Albert J. Catalano, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Richard I. Torpey, Philadelphia, for Allan Lashner.
Lawrence Barth, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth for Charities.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 1142
The Terri Barbara Lashner Memorial Charitable Trust. Sylvia LASHNER, Appellant, v. Allan N. LASHNER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Gary A. Lashner, Albert J. Catalano, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Richard I. Torpey, Philadelphia, for Allan Lashner.
Lawrence Barth, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth for Charities.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
